Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Northbound Reroute near 75th/Exchange
ShortDescription: Northbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Yates and over regular route due to, street blockage near 75th/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Yates and over regular route due to, street blockage near 75th/Exchange.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Southbound Reroute near Austin/Division
ShortDescription: Southbound 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Division, Central, Augusta and Austin due to, street blockage near Austin/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Division, Central, Augusta, Austin and over the regular route due to, street blockage near Austin/Division.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Damen. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Damen.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
